short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notify students when their grades change.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Target Audience and Installation: Students at FFHS can install this extension to track their grades. 

Functionality: The extension regularly checks for new grades. It only works when the user is logged into FFHS. Grades may be used to calculate an average score of FFHS classes.

Email Notifications: To receive email notifications, the user must provide an email address. When new grades are published, the user receives an email notification about the grade change.
